name: Semester One: An Intramural Hockey Story
name_original: Semester One: An Intramural Hockey Story
description: This is a short game I created to test my ability to make a game in a week. It follows Mary, a university freshman, as she learns to play hockey in her first semester. You choose her equipment, what position she plays, and what skills she improves. The more she practices, the better she plays.  Tip: go for breadth in skills rather than depth or specialization.
